comment: Tell me your Glowup . I'll start : was week at Twiter . Joined as an IC , as TPM for Civic Integrity . I'm now leading * Consumer * Technical Program Management at Twitter , phenomenal team of people ... and I'm Global Co-Lead of <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Tell me your Glowup . I'll start : was week at Twiter . Joined as an IC , as TPM for Civic Integrity . I'm now leading * Consumer * Technical Program Management at Twitter , phenomenal team of people ... and I'm Global Co-Lead of <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / product
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Glowup")
                  :poss y)
            :ARG2 (ii / i))
      :snt2 (s / start-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (w / week
                  :time-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (c / company
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Twiter"))))
            :snt3 (j / join-04
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / IC)
                  :ARG3 (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (c2 / company
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "TPM"))
                        :ARG2 (o / organization
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Civic"
                                    :op2 "Integrity"))))
            :snt4 (a / and
                  :op1 (l / lead-02
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (c3 / consume-01)))
                  :op2 (l2 / lead-02
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (t2 / team
                              :consist-of (p3 / person)
                              :mod (p4 / phenomenal)))
                  :time (n5 / now))
            :op3 (l3 / lead-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (g / globe)
                  :mod (t3 / together))))

comment: { Not too sure who needs to hear this today : but even in spite of this , I still feel like a fraud a lot of the time . The imposter syndrome is real , folks . Be kind to yourself and know that you deserve to be here . And when you forget , I'll be here to remind you . }
amr:
# ::snt { Not too sure who needs to hear this today : but even in spite of this , I still feel like a fraud a lot of the time . The imposter syndrome is real , folks . Be kind to yourself and know that you deserve to be here . And when you forget , I'll be here to remind you . }
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s / sure-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (n / need-01
                              :ARG1 (h / hear-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (t / this)
                                    :time (t2 / today))))
                  :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG3 (t3 / too)))
            :ARG2 (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (d / defraud-01
                        :ARG0 ii)
                  :time (t4 / time
                        :quant (l / lot))
                  :mod (s2 / still)
                  :concession (t5 / this)))
      :snt2 (r / real-04
            :ARG1 (s3 / syndrome
                  :mod (ii2 / imposter)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (k / kind-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (f2 / folk)
                  :ARG2 f2)
            :op2 (k2 / know-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 f2
                  :ARG1 (d2 / deserve-01
                        :ARG0 f2
                        :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                              :ARG1 f2
                              :ARG2 (h3 / here)))))
      :snt4 (a2 / and
            :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 ii)
            :ARG2 (h4 / here)
            :time (f3 / forget-01
                  :ARG0 f2)))
